s.text: Of Blair, who has enjoyed close relations with Murdoch, the paper said, "With every passing day he has a clearer idea of Mr Murdoch and his true nature.
Asking how Murdoch would justify the News of the World 's outing of Brown, the Guardian said in an editorial Monday: "It is, of course, a futile question.
